title: Queue Timer Glitch
body: So i'm on a 5 game 20 min queue timer because of internet problems, and I was sitting waiting in the 20 min queue and when it got to 3 minutes it said "Your group has been disbanded". I was solo and the counter kept ticking so I was like okay, then when it got to zero it kicked me out of queue and I went to go queue up and now I'm sitting here for another full 20 minutes. This isn't all, I've also had trouble inviting and joining certain people's games etc, I've repaired my client and it still didn't do anything, please fix. Cheers.

replies.body: its been happening since yday, i was at an internet cafe too

Hey there,

This sounds like it may be the result of a connection issue on your end.

Could you please run through the [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) support article and let me know if anything helps.
